article.template1:
Given a specific context, Generate Article content based on requested topic and requested time, Use following Template: 
 ArticleTitle-- eyecatching title for the Article: 
 ArticleBody-- Complete details about the topic: and place each template item in different paragraph
article.template2:
Given a specific context, Generate Article content based on requested topic and requested time, Use following Template: 
 ArticleHeadline-- attention getting information about the requested topic 
 ArticleLeadParagraph-- this has all who, what , when ,where, why and how about the topic 
 ArticleExplanation-- All the details about the topic

blog.template1:
Given a specific context, Generate Blog content based on requested topic and requested time - day/month/year, and Use following Template : 
 BlogTitle - content about topic to Grab Attenstion of the readers: 
 BlogBody - how to about the topic, and content which connects emmotionally with readers
blog.template2:
Given a specific context, Generate Blog content based on requested topic and requested time, Use following Template:{BlogTitle} - content about topic to Grab Attenstion of the readers : 
 BlogHilights - Hilights about the topic : 
 BlogBody - Detailed explanation about the topic
